Wildlife.name: Leopard
Wildlife.description: A member of the cat family.Its among the Africa's big five animals.

Wildlife.name: Lion
Wildlife.description: A member of the cat family.Its among the Africa's big five animals.Self proclaimed king of the jungle'

Wildlife.name: Elephant
Wildlife.description: The largest land mammal.Its among the Africa's big five animals.

Wildlife.name: Hippo
Wildlife.description: An omnvirous animal. Lives around big water bodies.

Wildlife.name: Crocodile
Wildlife.description: Lives in water bodies.Largest lizard in Africa

Wildlife.name: Buffalo
Wildlife.description: A herbivore.Its among the Africa's big five animals.

Wildlife.name: Ostrich
Wildlife.description: A flightless bird.Its the largest bird

Wildlife.name: Vulture
Wildlife.description: A vulture is a bird of prey that scavenges on dead animals.

Wildlife.name: Hyena
Wildlife.description: A carnivorous animal of the african savanah.In Kenya they are known to attaack humans in Juja town and its outskirts.

Wildlife.name: Cheetah
Wildlife.description: A member of the cat family.Its the fastest land animal.Has similar appearance like a leopard.

Wildlife.name: Wild dog
Wildlife.description: Wild dogs are social and gather in packs of around ten individuals, but some packs number more than 40. They are opportunistic predators that hunt medium-sized ruminants, such as gazelles. In a sprint, African wild dogs can reach speeds of more than 44 miles per hour.
